title: A Whippoorwill in the Woods - description of moths

content.question: The diction used to describe moths in lines 19â€“21 suggests that

choices.label: science is slowly beginning to understand certain mysteries
the speaker finds some aspects of nature alien to her
nature is able to provide a truly tragic spectacle
the beauty of nature is a source of comfort to the speaker

content.answer: the speaker finds some aspects of nature alien to her

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
